trans-unit.source: Represents an individual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column header.
trans-unit.target: 代表個人<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否可以按一下此欄標題來排序<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>由相關聯的資料行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以按一下此欄標題來排序<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>由相關聯的資料行; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.CanUserSort*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.CanUserSort*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.CanUserSort*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> associated with this column header.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref>與此資料行的標頭相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The column associated with this column header.
trans-unit.target: 此資料行的標頭相關聯的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style for displaying column headers during a header drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考的樣式來顯示資料行標頭在標頭拖曳作業期間的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The style key for floating column headers.
trans-unit.target: 浮點資料行標頭樣式索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style for the drop location indicator during a header drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考的樣式置放位置指示器標頭拖曳作業期間的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The style key for the drop location indicator.
trans-unit.target: 置放位置指示器樣式索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display position of the column associated with this column header relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此資料行標頭，相對於其他資料行中相關聯的資料行的顯示位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The display position of associated column relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相對於其他資料行中相關聯的資料行的顯示位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.DisplayIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.DisplayIndex*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.DisplayIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the column associated with this column header is prevented from scrolling horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與此資料行的標頭相關聯的資料行是否禁止水平捲動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated column is prevented from scrolling horizontally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果相關聯的資料行無法捲動水平空間。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.IsFrozen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.IsFrozen*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.IsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the column header when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用新的範本時，會建立資料行標頭的視覺化樹狀。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event and initiates sorting.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件和排序會起始。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the header is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下標頭時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this column header.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref>這個資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer for this column header.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料行的標頭的新自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>這個控制項不再收到滑鼠事件訊息時所發生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標位於這個控制項上時按下滑鼠左鍵的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標位於此控制項上方且放開滑鼠左的按鈕的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>發生於滑鼠指標移動此元素上方的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to paint the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>用來繪製資料行分隔符號的標頭行。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to paint column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製資料行行首的分隔線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user interface (UI) visibility of the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者介面 (UI) 可見性的資料行分隔符號的標頭行。

trans-unit.source: The UI visibility of the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的標頭分隔符號行 UI 可見性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorVisibility*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> is sorted by the associated column and whether the column values are in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>相關聯的資料行和資料行值是否以遞增或遞減順序排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction of the column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if unsorted.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的排序方向或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果未排序。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SortDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SortDirection*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SortDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
